original: BROANDER, Carl-Johan, Avdelningschef, Stockholm, f Eke, Gotl, 29/10 95 av dir N J B o Hildur Munthe, gm Thyra Lindgren. Realex, lantm.sk m kontr.assist.kurs, Hvilans folkhögsk :s högre avd. Prakt lantbr Gotl o Skåne 10—15, insp Bölske gård Gotl 17, eget lantbr Gotl (samm.signa Vestrume, Risungs o Fardume gdr), 18—24, lagerch Gotl Lantm Centralfrn 24—33, avd.chef Sv Lantm :s Riks-frbs kraftfoderverk o spannmålslagring i Sthlms frihamn sed. 33. Sommarbost Militärvägen 8, Norrviken. Under Gotl.tdn komm uppdr i Rute s:n, bl a lantbr.omb hos Hushålln.sällsk f Rute, Bunge o Fleringe. Inneh en del skyttem o medaljer. Hobbies: tidigare friv skytterör, num trädg.skötsel.
translated: BROANDER, Carl-Johan, Division Manager, Stockholm, born in Eke, Gotland, on October 29, 1895, son of director N.J.B. and Hildur Munthe, married to Thyra Lindgren. Completed primary education, agricultural school, and contract assistant course at Hvilan Folk High School's higher department. Practical farming in Gotland and Skåne from 1910 to 1915. Inspector at Bölske estate in Gotland in 1917. Own farming in Gotland, including Vestrume, Risungs, and Fardume farms, from 1918 to 1924. Warehouse manager at Gotland Lantmanna Centralfrn from 1924 to 1933. Division Manager at Swedish Lantmanna Riks-förbund's animal feed plant and grain storage in Stockholm's free port since 1933. Summer residence at Militärvägen 8, Norrviken. Served in various positions in Rute parish on Gotland, including agricultural officer for the Household Association in Rute, Bunge, and Fleringe. Holds several shooting and medal awards. Hobbies include previously voluntary shooting practice and current gardening.

education.description: Completed contract assistant course at Hvilan Folk High School's higher department

workExperience.description: Worked as a practical farmer in Gotland and Skåne
Worked as an inspector at Bölske estate in Gotland
Owned and managed own farms in Gotland, including Vestrume, Risungs, and Fardume farms
Worked as a warehouse manager at Gotland Lantmanna Centralfrn
Currently working as a division manager at Swedish Lantmanna Riks-förbund's animal feed plant and grain storage in Stockholm's free port

additionalProperty.name: Hobbies
additionalProperty.value: Previously voluntary shooting practice, Current gardening
